typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Marques as string,
		{Région} as string,
		{Nom Agence} as string,
		CIA as string,
		{Département} as string,
		{Référence Article} as string,
		{Description Article} as string,
		{Catégorie Achat} as string,
		{Quantitées livrées} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Marques/ Constructeur} as string,
		{Gestion entrepôt} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EHS
source(output(
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string,
		Dept as string,
		{Code Postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrganisationEHS
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VenteDirecte
select3 compose(mapColumn(
		id,
		PossAMid = id,
		reference = id,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = id,
		qte_venteDirecte = id
	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> ddimplement@(output1)
EHS derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		Marques = iif(!isNull(Marques), upper(Marques), upper({Marques/ Constructeur}))) ~> ExtractMonthYear
derivedColumn2 filter(!isNull(CIA)) ~> FiltrerCIA
OrganisationEHS filter(!isNull({CP Coop.})) ~> FiltreCPCoop
FiltreCPCoop aggregate(groupBy({CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid),
	{Nom Coopérative} = max({Nom Coopérative}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		Dept = max(Dept),
		{Code Postal} = max({Code Postal})) ~> UniqueCpCoopHubsApid
FiltrerCIA, UniqueCpCoopHubsApid join(CIA == {CP Coop.},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinCIACPCoop
FiltrerCIA, UniqueCpCoopHubsApid join(CIA == {CP Coop.},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLeftCIACPCoop
InnerJoinCIACPCoop, Rename join(coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence Article}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence Article}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& dropDuplicatedColumn@year == Rename@year
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinVenteDirect
join1 derive({Quantitées livrées} = qt_final) ~> QuantiteesLivres
VenteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
QuantiteesLivres derive(distributeur = "EHS",
		Marques = coalesce(Marques , {Marques/ Constructeur}),
		reference = replace({Référence Article}, 'SDU', '')) ~> distributeur
distributeur select(mapColumn(
		marque_str = Marques,
		{Région},
		{Nom Agence},
		agence_code = CIA,
		{Département},
		{Référence Article},
		{Description Article},
		{Catégorie Achat},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantitées livrées},
		year,
		{Gestion entrepôt},
		month,
		yearmonth,
		{CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		POSSAMidString = POSSAMid,
		BrandID,
		Dept,
		{Code postal} = {Code Postal},
		yearmonth = year,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe},
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenamePOSSAMIDstring
RenamePOSSAMIDstring select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = marque_str,
		{Région},
		{Nom Agence},
		agence_code,
		{Département},
		{Référence Article},
		{Description Article},
		{Catégorie Achat},
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		{Gestion entrepôt},
		month,
		yearmonth,
		{CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		POSSAMidString,
		BrandID,
		Dept,
		{Code postal},
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe},
		reference,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameMarqueFile
ExtractMonthYear select(mapColumn(
		Marques,
		{Région},
		{Nom Agence},
		CIA,
		{Département},
		{Référence Article},
		{Description Article},
		{Catégorie Achat},
		{Quantitées livrées},
		year,
		month,
		{Gestion entrepôt},
		{Marques/ Constructeur},
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropDuplicatedColumn
JoinVenteDirect select(mapColumn(
		Marques,
		{Région},
		{Nom Agence},
		CIA,
		{Département},
		{Référence Article},
		{Description Article},
		{Catégorie Achat},
		{Quantitées livrées},
		year = dropDuplicatedColumn@year,
		month,
		{Gestion entrepôt},
		{Marques/ Constructeur},
		yearmonth,
		{CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		POSSAMid,
		BrandID,
		Dept,
		{Code Postal},
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 keyGenerate(output(idDecrementation as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> idDecrementation
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMid,
		{Référence Article},
		year,
		month,
		{Quantitées livrées},
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
select2 derive({Quantitées livrées} = toFloat({Quantitées livrées}),
		{Qté vente directe} = toFloat({Qté vente directe}),
		month = toInteger(month)) ~> derivedColumn1
ddimplement@output1 select(mapColumn(
		id_ = id,
		qt_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
idDecrementation, endDecrementation join(idDecrementation == id_,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
dropDuplicatedColumn derive({Référence Article} = replace({Référence Article}, 'SDU', '')) ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMid,
		{Référence Article},
		year,
		month,
		{Quantitées livrées},
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
RenameMarqueFile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SortieEcoulementEHS.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SoriteEHS
JoinLeftCIACPCoop sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EHSOrganisationNotfound.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EHSOrganisationNotfound
